title: Calculating Grades using Functions
description: Create a program that calculates the grade of a student based on their scores in three subjects: math, science, and english. The program should define a function to calculate the average score and another function to determine the grade based on the average score. The grade should be determined as follows: A (90-100), B (80-89), C (70-79), D (60-69), F (below 60).
